mapper.select: select date(created_time) as created_time, sum(if(order_status = '已完成', 1, 0)) as completed_orders, sum(if(order_status = '未完成', 1, 0)) as incomplete_orders, sum(if(order_status = '过期', 1, 0)) as expired_orders, count(*) as total_orders from shop_orders where date(created_time) = curdate() group by created_time;
